parse.title: The Lost Millennium
parse.wikitext:
{{For|other uses|''The Lost Millennium'' (disambiguation)}} {{Infobox set | image = TLM-BoosterEN.png | en_name = The Lost Millennium | fr_name = Le Millenaire Perdu | de_name = The Lost Millennium | it_name = Il Millennio Perduto | pt_name = O Milênio Perdido | es_name = El Milenio Perdido | ja_name = ザ・ロスト・ミレニアム | romaji_name = Za Rosuto Mireniamu | ko_name = 잃어버린 천년 | hanja_name = | ko_rr_name = Ilh-eobeorin Cheonnyeon | type = [[Booster Pack]] | series = Core Booster | size = 60 | cover_card = [[Ancient Gear Golem]] | ja_database_id = 1107003 | en_database_id = 11104002 | fr_database_id = 31104002 | de_database_id = 21104002 | it_database_id = 41104002 | pt_database_id = 11104002 | es_database_id = 51103002 | ko_database_id = 71104003 | ae_database_id = 5000000027000 | order_number = 404 | prefix = TLM | fr_prefix = TLM-FR | it_prefix = TLM-IT | pt_prefix = TLM-PT | sp_prefix = TLM-SP | ae_prefix = TLM-AE | sneak_peek = yes | vendor_edition = yes | special_edition = yes | en_release_date = June 1, 2005 | ae_release_date = January 19, 2006 | jp_release_date = February 24, 2005 | kr_release_date = August 29, 2006 | fr/de/it/sp_release_date = June 1, 2005 | pt_release_date = June 1, 2005 | prev = Flaming Eternity | next = Cybernetic Revolution }} '''''The Lost Millennium''''' is a [[Core Booster]] in the ''[[Yu-Gi-Oh! Official Card Game]]'' (''OCG'') and the ''[[Yu-Gi-Oh! Trading Card Game]]'' (''TCG''). It is the fourth Core Booster of [[Series 4]]. Its main focuses are on [[Rock]]-[[Type]] monsters and the [[archetype]] "[[Elemental HERO]]", stylized "Elemental Hero" at the time. It also introduced several cards used in the ''[[Yu-Gi-Oh! GX]]'' series. This set has been released in the ''TCG'' in English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese and Spanish and in the ''OCG'' in [[Japanese]], [[Asian-English]] and [[Korean]]. In the ''TCG'', this set became legal for premier events on July 1, 2005.{{cite web |title=UDE-Turnier-Anhang Anhang A: Yu-Gi-Oh! TCG-Verfahrensweisen |url=http://www.upperdeckentertainment.com/op/policy/files/de/UDEAppendixAYGO04mar2005_de.pdf |publisher=Upper Deck Entertainment |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20060108034805/http://www.upperdeckentertainment.com/op/policy/files/de/UDEAppendixAYGO04mar2005_de.pdf |archive-date=8 January 2006 |format=pdf |date=1 March 2005 |language=German}} The set was also released in ''[[The Lost Millennium: Special Edition]]''. This is one of the four Booster Packs combined into ''[[Dark Revelation Volume 3]]''. On February 18, 2020, this set was re-released in Korean. ==Features== * Includes cards used by [[Jaden Yuki]], [[Vellian Crowler]], [[Yami Marik]], [[Yami Yugi]], and [[Zane Truesdale]]. * Includes members and/or support for the "[[sphinx]]" and "[[LV]]" archetypes, as well as the [[D.D.]], [[Wight]], and [[Konami Arcade Games]] series. * Introduces the "[[Elemental HERO]]", "[[Batteryman]]", and "[[Charmer]]s" archetypes to the ''OCG'' and ''TCG''. ==Breakdown== In the Japanese version of this set, each pack contains 5 cards and each box contains 30 packs. In the ''TCG'' and Asian-English, version each pack contains 9 cards and each box contains 24 packs. In the Korean version, each pack contains 5 cards. The Japanese version contains 60 cards in total, or 71 in the [[Master Set]]. This comprises: * 11 [[Ultimate Rare]] * 4 [[Ultra Rare]] * 7 [[Super Rare]] * 14 [[Rare]] * 35 [[Common]] The ''TCG'', Asian-English and Korean version contains 60 cards in total, or 85 in the Master Set. This comprises: * 25 [[Ultimate Rare]] * 4 [[Ultra Rare]] * 7 [[Super Rare]] * 14 [[Rare]] * 35 [[Common]] ==Gallery== TLM-BoosterEN.png | English
